title: The Cost of Looking Generic: How Similarity Forces You to Compete on Price
excerpt: When you look like everyone else, customers have no rational way to choose between you and your five closest competitors. So they default to the only thing that is different: Price.

title: Why Most Small Business Sites Don't Generate Leads (and What 3% of Sites Do Differently)
excerpt: Most small business websites don't have a traffic problem. They have a trust and clarity problem. Here's what the top 3% do differently.
